author: BBT
title: Senior business travel consultant
text:
Salary range: Undisclosed 
A vibrant, independent business travel company in the North West of London require a hard working and experienced Senior Business Travel Consultant to work on some of the most demanding and high profile accounts in the entertainment, sporting and corporate industry. 
This is a Business travel consultant role unlike the others - you will be working for a company who reward performance with a fantastic salary and have a great company structure and career prospects. EXTREMELY GOOD SALARY for the right person and all the perks of working in the travel industry! Working on a mixture of high profile accounts you will have the opportunity to work in this very niche sector of the industry and be challenged at the same time.As a senior business travel consultant you will undertake an array of tasks & responsibilities: Dealing with bookings from start to finish including invoicing, changes, ticketing Arranging all international travel for high profile VIPs, corporate and sporting clients Building relationships with clients and suppliers to ensure excellent service at all times Attending functions, events and team building trips 
Senior business travel consultant remuneration package: Highly competitive salary Generous holiday allowance and flexibility Friendly but busy environment within a small team Annual bonuses depending on company/personal performance Be part of a growing company Discounted holidays & flights 
Plus more!!!!To apply for this fabulous senior business travel consultant opportunity you need to have the following: Excellent airfares knowledge Confidence to deal with VIP and blue chip accounts in a professional manner. Proficiency on Galileo is preferred but other GDS may be considered providing you meet all other criteria Excellent communication skills, both written and spoken English Previous Business Travel experience is essential
